The code chunk calculates offsets (`leftOffset`, `rightOffset`, `topOffset`, `bottomOffset`) within the `getConcentricZones` method, determining how far in each direction (left/right/up/down) from a given zone ID to search for surrounding zones within a specified radius.

leftOffset = min(col, radius)
        rightOffset = min(self.gridSize - (col + 1), radius)
        topOffset = min(row, radius)
        bottomOffset = min(self.gridSize - (row + 1), radius)
